metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20237 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An uncontrolled resource consumption (memory leak) flaw was found inZeroMQ's src/xpub.cpp in versions before 4.3.3. This flaw allows a remoteunauthenticated attacker to send crafted PUB messages that consumeexcessive memory if the CURVE/ZAP authentication is disabled on the server,causing a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability isto system availability.

criterions.comment: zeromq3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
